game.description: The village of Oakwood has been plagued by a series of mysterious disappearances. The villagers are afraid to venture out at night, and the local lord is offering a reward to anyone who can put an end to whatever evil force is behind it.
game.objective: Investigate the disappearances in Oakwood and put an end to the source of the trouble.

tasks.description: Speak with the villagers and gather information about the disappearances.
Investigate the old windmill on the outskirts of town, where several of the villagers were last seen.
Face whatever evil force is behind the disappearances and put an end to it.

game.title: The Disappearances of Oakwood
